text: Cosmas Michael Angkur (4 January 1937 – 18 December 2024) was an Indonesian Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1967. Angkur was named bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Bogor, Indonesia in 1994. He retired in November 2013.Cosmas Michael Angkur Angkur was born in Lewur, then-Dutch East Indies. Angkur died on 18 December 2024 at a hospital in East Nusa Tenggara, Indonesia at the age of 87.Lutti nell’episcopato ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1937 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Indonesian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Cosmas Michael Angkur
